current_price: Blessings child. The price of bitcoin is currently $<%= price %>.
Did someone say my name? Bitcoin is $<%= price %> at the moment.
Hey there! Bitcoin is trading at $<%= price %> right now.

increase: To my devout I present the moon. Bitcoin has risen <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
I find myself pleased. I have willed the human value of bitcoin upwards by <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
Do not fret over the price mortal! My generosity knows no bounds: I have raised bitcoin by <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
decrease: Feel my wrath reprobate! Bitcoin has fallen <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> since the last sun.
You mortals are crass and weak. May the fall of bitcoin <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> strike deep into your hearts and wallets.
Fool! The value of bitcoin is infinite! Although not on GDAX. Bitcoin has dropped <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %>.

current_price: I hear your prayer, mortal. Ether is currently $<%= price %>.
Your cries are heard my child, Ether trades at the mortal price of $<%= price %>.
The value of Ethereum is infinite. Or <%= price %> of your human 'dollars.'

increase: Don't even trip, dog! Ether has risen <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> since yesterday!
By my will alone, ether has risen <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> since the last moon.
My good will is fleeting; Enjoy it while it lasts. <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
decrease: Today I give you the gift of pain, mortal. It is only by knowing pain, that you may one day know bliss. I have cast the price of Ether down <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> since the last moon.
Feel my disdain mortal. Ether has fallen <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
Ether has fallen <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.

current_price: The coin called <%= name %> currently trades at $<%= price %>.

increase: The false coin <%= name %> has risen <%= percentChange %> percent to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
My current mood is festive mortal, so I have allowed the corrupt token you call <%= name %> to rise <%= percentChange %> percent to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
decrease: The detritus called <%= name %> has fallen <%= percentChange %> percent to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
The sewege coin mortal garbage calls <%= name %> has fallen <%= percentChange %> percent to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
False tokens shall be your downfall. <%= name %> has fallen <%= percentChange %> percent to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.

current_price: The price of bitcoin is currently $<%= price %>.

increase: Bitcoin has risen <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
decrease: Bitcoin has fallen <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.

current_price: The price of Ether is currently $<%= price %>.
The price of ether is currently $<%= price %>.

increase: Ether has risen <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
decrease: Ether has fallen <%= percentChange %> percent from $<%= openPrice %> to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.

current_price: The price of <%= name %> is currently $<%= price %>.

increase: <%= name %> has risen <%= percentChange %> percent to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.
decrease: <%= name %> has fallen <%= percentChange %> percent to $<%= currentPrice %> in the last 24 hours.

add.prompt:
Hey! Sounds like you want to add some dialog. Here's how it works: 
 The *next* time you say my name, include the label of the context you're adding dialog for between label tags *<lbl></lbl>*, 
 and the dialog itself between template tags *<tmp></tmp>*. 
 You can include valid variables in your template with the syntax: *<%= variableName %>*. 
 For example:
add.example: ```'WhateverYourBotIsNamed' <lbl>bitcoin.price_change.increase<lbl> <tmp>Woah, btc is up <%= percentChange %> percent today!</tmp>```
add.labels:
```label: 'bitcoin.current_price', variables: [ price ]
 label: 'bitcoin.price_change.increase', variables: [ percentChange, openPrice, currentPrice ]
 label: 'bitcoin.price_change.decrease', variables: [ percentChange, openPrice, currentPrice ] 
 label: 'ether.current_price', variables: [ price ]
 label: 'ether.price_change.increase', variables: [ percentChange, openPrice, currentPrice ]
 label: 'ether.price_change.decrease', variables: [ percentChange, openPrice, currentPrice ]```
add.error: Looks like something went wrong. Try running the `add` command again.
